author: Jennifer Drysdale
title: Demi Lovato Snuggles Boyfriend Guilherme 'Bomba' Vasconcelos -- See the Adorable Pic!
text: Demi Lovato Snuggles Boyfriend Guilherme 'Bomba' Vasconcelos -- See the Adorable Pic! by Jennifer Drysdale 11:26   Playing Demi Lovato Snuggles Boyfriend Guilherme 'Bomba' Vasconcelos -- See the Adorable Pic! Demi Lovato is snuggling up to her new man! The 24-year-old singer's new boyfriend, Guilherme 'Bomba' Vasconcelos, took to Instagram on Wednesday to share a cuddly snap of the two. A post shared by Guilherme "Bomba" Vasconcelos (@bombatuf) on Feb 22, 2017 at 5:12pm PST Lovato opened up about her new beau for the first time during an appearance on The Ellen DeGeneres Show this week, revealing that she gets nervous while watching the MMA fighter in the ring. "I don't feel bad [for the person he's hurting]," she added. Lovato's definitely got some fighting skills herself. Watch the singer take down Vasconcelos in the video below. RELATED SLIDESHOW
